sub_title: Area- & Real Estate Development manager at Schiphol Real Estate
summary:
Experience:

Area Development
Responsible for creating a positive business case for area development, taking into account both buildings as infrastructural works. Be responsible for and contribute to developing an urban space plan, with a long term view on developments.

Real Estate Development
Acquisition, Development and redevelopment of urban areas with an integral view for the economy, the social structure and the fysical aspects of a city. My special interest lies with Olympic area Development. Both as expert and experienced proces manager.

Acquisition of plots of lands or future tenants, Define program, negotiate with municipalities, sign up urban/architectural firms, responsible for the design phase, responsible for selling the project to investors or private parties, responsible for the total revenues of the project.

Innovation and ideation
Initiate new business ideas, develop concept to plan and with a continuous focus on market perception, and customer experience. The most recent example is to develop Mobility as a Service as a way to improve landside accessibility of Rotterdam the Hague AirPort. Mobility as a Service is believen to be a disruptive way of how we use Mobility.

Strategic Portfolio Management
Developing and executing strategic masterplans for worldwide corporate real estate portfolio. Advising in complex and political environments for optimising the portfolio. At this moment the cost saving aspect is top priority.The focus of my role is on masterplanning and transaction management, although we are also responsible for space management and implementing work space concepts.


Goals:

To provide a positive contribution to mixed use area developments. 
To strengthen the relationships with clients in a more personal way.

Specialties: Team player, high standards of delivered work, good social and commercial skills, reliable, client focus, high responsibility, passionate.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
In this role responsible for both the area development of Schiphol CBD, Business Park Rotterdam The Hague Airport, as well as the real estate development related to both areas. The role combines expertise on commercials, financials and legal aspects of development of commercial real estate with Managing The different projectteams. Currently involved in 3 program developments:
- Relocation of Freightbuilding 17 for dnata. This development consistent of multiple subprojects, with a Total spend of 160M euro. My role involves Managing The different projectteams and making sure that All stakeholders are involved. This project is complex because it is under a huge time pressure in The most difficult environment of front row cargo line (landside -airside border)
- area development Badhoevedorp Zuid. The projectteam of both internal and external stakeholders is working on a Masterplan for development. 
- development of a New Headquarters at Schiphol East for approx. 40.000 sqm. This program of development containers development of real estate, development of infrastructure and negotiating with the Client. 

Work experience in The past:

Development of 10.000 sqm officebuilding with an exemplary huge sustainability ambition.
On occasion involved in the renovation and redevelopment of Skyport building at Schiphol Airport.

Initiator and procesmanager of the renovation and extension of the departure lounge at Rotterdam the Hague AirPort. This development is complex due to the fact that we have to work in a multi stakeholder environment with a continuous ongoing operation. 

Furthermore initiator of Mobility as a Service innovation project at the AirPort. The main goal is to creatie a new Mobility platform that ensures users with planning, booking, payment and ongoing real time info on both public and private transportation modes.

Real estate developer and commercially responsible for mortuary at Schiphol. This is a cradle to cradle real estate development.
profile_positions.title: Real Estate Developer
Strategic Portfolio Manager

profile_positions.description:
In this role responsible for all commercial, financial and legal aspects of development of commercial real estate.


My projects: 
•	Strip and Scheg phase Overhoeks – Amsterdam;
Initiate Temporary exploitation of the existing buildings (Toren Overhoeks 8.000 m2, and Groot Lab 16.000 m2. Negotiate with municipality on temporary zoning provisions and full market search for creative and innovative companies to start business in Overhoeks.
In the meanwhile also redevelop the existing buildings and two new towers for a total of 40.000 m2 for offices, retail and restaurants.
•	Spuikwartier – The Hague;
Innercity retail development, existing of 4 subprojects (Spuimarkt, Hema Bijenkorf, Asta and New Hague Passage) total 80.000 m² retail en hotel.
•	Bellevue – The Hague;
Acquisition and redevelopment of existing building in direct area of the Central Station of The Hague (35.000 m2).
•	Chicago project Kop van Zuid – Rotterdam.
Built to suit project for Hotel 10.000 m2.

profile_positions.description:
As Real Estate Developer I was responsible for the development of projects from acquisition to draft plan.

My projects:
•	Het Land van Ooit – Tongeren (Belgium).
Acquisition by competition for leisure development. Concept development in cooperation with Land van Ooit.
•	De Oude Stad - Bokrijk (Belgium).
Acquisition by competition for leisure development.
•	Winterslag - Genk (Belgium).
Acquisition by competition for leisure, sport facilities and retail. This site used to be a mine site and had been vacant for 10 years.
* Spui The Hague
Innercity redevelopment of 28 apartments;
* Spui - Lamgroen The Hague
Innercity redevelopment of 40 apartments;
* Wijnhaven  Rotterdam
